name: Clarent Saga: Mana Chapter 0
description:
A RPG with fast action battles. A great entry point for newcomers!
Warning! This is only the first introductory chapter!

Features


  • Fast action RPG battles heavily inspired by the Mana Series;
  • Great soundtrack composed by Hiroki Kikuta and reminiscent of the Mana Series;
  • Great pixel graphics reminiscent of 16-bit JRPG classics such as Secret of Mana, Trials of Mana, Chrono Trigger, Secret of Evermore, Tales of Phantasia, Terranigma, Illusion of Gaia, and Star Ocean;
  • 4 Difficulties.

Story


When the evil cult of Brax summons its demon lord, can raider Alex use the Clarent sword to stop them from taking over and enslaving everyone? A light-hearted and sometimes sad RPG, with emotional moments.
